CA-ON-Toronto-Internet System Administrator
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Description

Nexx Online is seeking an experienced System Administrator with strong Windows NT/2000, Internet Hosting, Security and firewall expertise.

The successful sysadmin must be able to design, install, and maintain systems using Windows 2000 Server technology for web hosting services in a 24/7 production environment.

Responsibilities

- Install, configure and security harden Windows NT and Win2K servers
- Manage IIS services in a high-density server environment
- Migration experience moving Windows NT/2000 servers locally and remotely
- Familiarity with Hosting Automation Tools
- Ability to develop programs and scripts to automate any repetitive system administration tasks
- Perform system backups, upgrades, and performance tuning
- Install, Configure and manage Firewalls, Switches
- Must understand & be able to manipulate Active Directory, ADSI, Windows NT Registry, IIS Metabase
- Skilled in IIS, ASP, VB Scripting, TCP/IP & Integration with Unix systems
- SQL 7/2000 Administration
- Solid understanding of Intel x86 based server hardware, including RAID configuration
- Experience limited to desktop or office network support is NOT adequate for this position

Requirements

- 2+ years of experience in management of Windows 2000/NT OS
- 2+ years UNIX/Linux Sys admin & Network Admin Experience
- Strong Scripting and Programming skills
- Strong team player with excellent communications skills
- Previous experience at an ISP or web hosting company an asset
- Formal education in computer science / programming or related majors
- Microsoft certification is a plus

Nexx Online Inc. is an equal opportunity employer and offers excellent compensation and benefits. Please send your resume with a cover letter by e-mail to jobs@nexx.com

Mention on Subject Line: Ref Code: NT-SYSADM
